item.title: The Epidemic of Judge-Made Law
item.description: By issuing nationwide injunctions against executive action, federal district courts are exercising too much power.

item.title: To Help Ukraine, Slash U.S. Energy Red Tape
item.description: If Congress helped Europe break its addiction to Russian energy, everyone would win — except Putin.

item.title: Does Anyone Know What a Nazi Is?
item.description: Not if Elon Musk is considered one.

item.title: What ‘Freedom Conservatism’ Is Missing
item.description: Unfortunately, too many FreeCons have quietly sawed off one of the legs of American conservatism’s famous stool.

item.title: Why the West Needs the Jewish People
item.description: No one understands the task facing orthodox churches in the post-Christian West more than Jews.
